title: Disgruntled Creditor Asked to Make Rival Bid for Speedcast
sub_head: A bankruptcy judge is giving Black Diamond Capital Management a chance to make an offer to buy the Australian company out of chapter 11
body:
A disgruntled creditor of Speedcast International Ltd., which opposed a financial restructuring of the satellite-communications company, has obtained clearance to submit a late takeover offer to buy the company out of bankruptcy.
“We want to bid as soon as we can,” said Al Hogan, a lawyer for creditor Black Diamond Capital Management LLC, during a hearing Wednesday in the U.S. Bankruptcy Court in Houston.
